response: "datenprivatsphäre ist menschenrecht! 🚫👀 why do companies and governments still think they can exploit our personal data without our consent? 🤷‍♂️ it's time for change! 💪 let's stand up for our rights and demand stricter data protection laws! 🚫🔍 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #menschenrechte"
